name: GET restaurants
query:
SELECT * FROM restaurant
ORDER BY restaurant_id ASC;

name: Rename fields
func:
msg.rename_fn = payload => payload.map(
    (item) => ({
        restaurantID: item.restaurant_id,
        restaurantName: item.restaurant_name,
        restaurantImage: item.restaurant_image,  // URL of the main/facade image of the restaurant
        noOfGroupsToday: 0,  // Number of existing groups for today
        cuisineType: item.restaurant_cuisine_type,      // Type of cuisine served
        address: item.restaurant_address,          // address of the restaurant
        latlng: [item.restaurant_lat, item.restaurant_lng],          // LatLng coordinate of the restaurant
        openingHours: item.restaurant_open_hours,     // Opening hours of the restaurant, e.g. 10:00am-9:00pm
        rating: item.restaurant_rating,           // Average rating of the restaurant (0-5 stars)
    })
)

return msg;

name: Check id & rename function
GET review
query:
SELECT 
review.*,
public."user".username as "reviewerName",
public."user".user_photo as "reviewerPhoto"
FROM review
INNER JOIN public."user"
ON review.reviewer_id = public."user".user_id
WHERE review_id = $id;

name: [IN] Rename fields and return first one element
Rename fields and return SINGLE element (first element)
Check id
Check id
GET user
query:
SELECT public."user".user_id, 
public."user".username, 
public."user".gender, 
public."user".user_photo, 
user_favourite_restaurant.restaurant_id as favourite_restaurant_id,
restaurant.restaurant_name,
restaurant.restaurant_image,
restaurant.restaurant_cuisine_type,
restaurant.restaurant_address,
restaurant.restaurant_lat,
restaurant.restaurant_lng,
restaurant.restaurant_open_hours,
restaurant.restaurant_rating
FROM public."user"
INNER JOIN user_favourite_restaurant
ON public."user".user_id = user_favourite_restaurant.user_id
INNER JOIN public.restaurant
ON user_favourite_restaurant.restaurant_id = public.restaurant.restaurant_id
WHERE public."user".user_id = $id;

name: GET reviews
query:
SELECT 
review.review_id as "reviewID",
review.restaurant_id as "restaurantID", 
review.reviewer_id as "reviewerID", 
public."user".username as "reviewerName",
public."user".user_photo as "reviewerPhoto",
review.review_rating as "reviewRating",
review.review_text as "reviewText",
review.review_images as "reviewImages"
FROM review
INNER JOIN public."user"
ON review.reviewer_id = public."user".user_id
WHERE restaurant_id = $id;

name: Check id
GET participants
query:
SELECT public."user".user_id, public."user".username, public."user".gender, public."user".user_photo
FROM public.user_group
INNER JOIN public."user"
ON public.user_group.user_id = public."user".user_id
WHERE group_id = $id;

name: Rename function
GET groups and participants
query:
SELECT public.user_group.group_id, public."user".user_id, public."user".username, public."user".gender, public."user".user_photo
FROM public.user_group
INNER JOIN public."user"
    ON public.user_group.user_id = public."user".user_id
INNER JOIN public."group"
    ON public.user_group.group_id = public."group".group_id
WHERE public."group".restaurant_id = $id AND public."group".group_meeting_timestamp > NOW();

name: INSERT INTO restaurant
query:
INSERT INTO public.restaurant(
	 name, image, cuisine_type, address, latitude, longitude, opening_hours)
	VALUES ($name, 
			$image,
			$cuisine_type, 
			$address, 
			$latitude, 
			$longitude,
			$opening_hours);
